title: Warlock Spells
content: e a beast fight alongside you. Every time the beast takes damage, it makes a Wisdom Saving Throw against your domination. 10 turns 18m WIS Save Concentration Evard's Black Tentacles Lvl 4 Conjuration ActionLevel 4 Warlock Spell Slot 3~18 Damage 3d6Bludgeoning Tentacles sprout from the ground, turning the area into Diffucult Terrain, attacking and Smothering creatures within. 10 turns 6m 18m STR Save Concentration Fire Shield Lvl 4 Evocation ActionLevel 4 Warlock Spell Slot 2d8 Fire (Conditional)
